# Domino Hands-On Workshop: Predictions

#### Get ready to work through a full end-to-end workflow — hands-on, practical, and powerful! In this workshop, you’ll:

**•** Connect to live data sources in real time  
**•** Prepare your data using your preferred IDE, with the option to tap into distributed compute clusters  
**•** Train multiple models across different frameworks  
**•** Compare model performance and choose the best fit  
**•** Deploy your model to a containerized endpoint and a web app for real-world use  
**•** Collaborate, document, and make your work fully reproducible and shareable

---

## Documentation

Find all the supporting materials you’ll need in the **Documentation** directory right here in Git.
